messages.text: Hello! My name is Hank Robin. I work with WXXI as their envrinonmental reporter. I noticed you've been supplying a bunch of nature posts for Henrietta. We really like them andwant to invite you to our informational meeting this Friday. It's ay 6, we hope you can make it!
messages.subject: Invitation to WXXI Training Session

messages.text: Congratulations, you are now a part of Yellr! You can start posting content right away!
messages.subject: Welcome to Yellr!
